reviews.title: Finally~
reviews.comment: This is excellent!!! I love it especially EXOtics ! Eventhough there\'s too much white and a bit plain but overall its great! :D
reviews.author: Zarifah NR

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice theme but im using galaxy s4 and there is a small black bar at the bottom of home screen. Could you please fixed it ? and the icons colors are so vivid and hard to find . Could you please change some of the color ? Could you please make theme for snsd, 4minute and Btob. Thz :)
reviews.author: Kevin Thaw

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: I love this theme, its really nice and clean cut. And as an EXOtic, I love the fact that it\'s EXO!
reviews.author: Angel Chanthavong

reviews.title: Perfect apps ever!!
reviews.comment: This apps is perfect..eventhough is more to plain white but yeah as long as it is EXO..it is more than best I can say..the arrangement of pic is perfect..I love it!! GOMAWO!!
reviews.author: Nurul Shuhaidah

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: I love this theme but I\'m using a Samsung Galaxy S4 and it isn\'t full screen. The bottom is cut a little but nevertheless it\'s so perfect omg.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I thinkn it looks too much plain because its white but overall tha feels for the theme is awesome especially for exotics :) thumbs up :)\tI hope other kpop groups also have this kind of theme. :)
reviews.author: Lychelle Tusi

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: But Luhan and Baekhyun\'s faces are cut in the home screen. :( And the upper tab background is compressed. :( I wanted to remove the upper tab background, but I can\'t remove the dock background. Also I wish you can also make a theme for INFINITE, so that my ringtones and alarms match with the INFINITE Destiny Dodol Pop app! :)
reviews.author: Jeanne Guantero

reviews.title: Finally&excelent
reviews.comment: Finally...there is an exo themes. Its great and clean. But too bad its too simple. Even though like that. I still love it because its exo o// good job and thanks^^
reviews.author: owl kai

reviews.title: Good, really good
reviews.comment: Love this theme! But EXO\'s faces on app drawer looks a bit strange, you know, the pictures are not cropped really good =) but overall, it\'s really good and I love it.
reviews.author: Rara Ayuningtyas

reviews.title: EXOSTAN
reviews.comment: good app! Like it ;\') exostans must have!! Recommended
reviews.author: nisrina meimei

reviews.title: I\'m in love!
reviews.comment: I totally love EXO and I am an Exotic so I definitely choose this once I found out that Dodol Laucher was able to give me what I loved.
reviews.author: Angela H

reviews.title: More exo?
reviews.comment: I really love this theme. Could u please do more exo themes? Or theme for each of the members, esp Luhan :)
reviews.author: Reika Rbl

reviews.title: Exotics
reviews.comment: Thanks for design this EXO theme I\'m love it!!!!\342\231\245
reviews.author: Emily Xinni

reviews.title: LOve it!
reviews.comment: sooo glad there is an exo theme available..simply love it!!! thanks :)
reviews.author: auie sanchez

reviews.title: Cool~
reviews.comment: Wooow i like it very muchh~^^
reviews.author: Alania Noorzaida

reviews.title: Its really good.
reviews.comment: I am so happy. I love it so much. Its so cute and i just love seeing my exo oppadeul all over my phone :)
reviews.author: siuneh poorian

reviews.title: Lu Han
reviews.comment: Please make an individual theme for lu han! I loves this launcher!! And i wants lu han theme..please Anw! I love this theme so much! Eventhough its plain and simple but i like it because its White and white is my favourite colour!!
reviews.author: Eujin Lee

reviews.title: cool !
reviews.comment: i love exo !
reviews.author: Syeira Hazmi
